participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Alice enjoys deep conversations and is passionate about her interests.
participant_1.background: i enjoy listening to classical music. i'm a christian. my favorite color is red. i can drive a tractor. my sister is a pole dancer.

participant_2.name: Michael

participant_2.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
